alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Henderson; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 10:17PM CDT until September 24 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Eastern Henderson County in central Texas... Northeastern Anderson County in central Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1017 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brownsboro, or 12 miles east of Athens, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Chandler, Van, Malakoff, Frankston, Brownsboro, Berryville, Edom, Lake Palestine, Forest Grove Reservoir, Coon Creek Lake, Brushy Creek, Redland, Murchison, Poynor, Coffee City, Moore Station, Ben Wheeler, Primrose, and New York. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 538 and 542. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
